participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, loves trying new things and exploring different cultures.
participant_1.background: I have been trying all types of food everywhere I go. I have been traveling the world for a few years. I own a yacht and I rent it out when I am not using it. I also like to cook but I am not very good at it. Hey there, I'm 23 and I love food.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, dreams of making a big change in life, with a strong sense of family values.
participant_2.background: I was raised on a horse farm. My family has raised horses for generations. I want to be a lawyer. I dream of moving to the city. I'm from a small town.
